author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Montech HyperFlow 360 Cooler on Amazon https://geni.us/dWBIbF6
The Yeston RX 9070 XT Sakura Sugar Atlantis GPU, which we've shortened to "Waifu" edition, shows the video card design world that not everything has to be a black-and-RGB rectangle. The Atlantis goes for a pink-and-blue gradient on its shroud with an anime character backplate, while also implementing a full flow-through area for the right-most of the three fans. The card has dual VBIOS, an LED switch, and otherwise standard features on the PCB. This review and benchmark of the Yeston RX 9070 XT Atlantis "OC" tests it for thermals, acoustics, and performance vs. the Sapphire RX 9070 XT Pulse, which is supposed to be closer to an MSRP model. We may look at the PowerColor Red Devil next, if there's interest!

Watch our original Yeston Cute Pet RX 580 review! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fGGKaX1D9Zo
And our Cute Pet case review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=62oPBdI9CSA
Or our RX 7900 XTX Yeston card review: htt
title: Wild Design: Yeston RX 9070 XT "Waifu" Sakura Sugar Atlantis GPU Review & Benchmarks
